scripts.prepare:testnet: mustache config/testnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/testnet.json src/mappings/helpers.template.ts > src/mappings/helpers.ts && mustache config/testnet.json src/mappings/pricing.template.ts > src/mappings/pricing.ts
scripts.prepare:mainnet: mustache config/mainnet.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/mainnet.json src/mappings/helpers.template.ts > src/mappings/helpers.ts && mustache config/mainnet.json src/mappings/pricing.template.ts > src/mappings/pricing.ts
